amendment.description: An amendment numbered 637 printed in Part A of House Report 117-405 to expand access to hospital and domiciliary care and medical services to South Korean veterans now living in the United States who served as a member of the Korean Armed Forces during the Vietnam War under VA's existing authority to serve allied beneficiaries.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A046) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A046) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A046) offered by Mr. Takano.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A046) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A046) Agreed to by voice vote.
